snippet.title: Manic Miners V0.3: The MINERS AND MACHINES update is here!
snippet.description:
It's been a long while, but today the largest update so far drops for Manic Miners! The vehicles are here, together with an extensive miner customization system with hundreds of parts and many surprises and improvements. Dive in and re-live an almost-complete Rock Raiders remake today! The only thing missing are the monsters... so stay tuned!

All downloads are available on the Itch page: https://baraklava.itch.io/manic-miners

Website: https://manicminers.baraklava.com/
Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/manicminers/
Discord link is on the website! Removed from here due to spambots.

Trailer by TheTveit https://www.youtube.com/c/TheTveit/videos
Music by Baraklava

Oh, and you thought I was joking when I said "Chief's corner"? Hmm... Must've been the upload date.
